creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Virginia Dofflemyer
description: bowl with rounded form; ring foot; decorated on top with flying phoenix at top center; plant at LRQ with blue, green and red leaves with gold; gold clouds; red rim with gold flowers and foliage; three cartouches on rim with diamond designs; exterior decorated with primarily blue foliage and shell design
inscription:
Inscription

on bottom, in blue: 福 (fuku, good fortune)
title: Plate
